content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today?
My air conditioner isn't working again. How much is it going to cost me to get someone to come look at it?
I'm sorry to hear about your air conditioner. I can try to get you an estimate. May I have your name first, please?
It's Pat Ritter. But I really need to know how much it costs before anything else.
Thank you, Pat. Could you please provide your address as well? That will help me determine an accurate estimate for you.
342 North Glen Avenue, please try to get me a number before we get too far along. Money's tight.
Thank you for your address, Pat. I'm now requesting a price estimate for your air conditioner service.

Pat, it looks like I can't provide a price estimate without having one of our technicians take a look in person. Would you like to book a diagnostic visit? We’ll make sure to keep costs as low as possible and inform you of any charges before starting work.
That’s frustrating. I just want to know if there’s a trip charge or what. Last time it ended up being way higher than I expected.

I completely understand your concern about unexpected charges, Pat. Our standard policy is to review your issue in person before quoting a definite price because every situation is a little different. Would you like me to check our availability for a technician visit and go over our basic diagnostic fees?
Fine, just tell me the soonest you can come. But I want a real person to go over the fees with me, not a robot.
Thank you, Pat. I’ll connect you with a member of our team who can discuss all fees clearly before booking your appointment.
reason: Customer requested to speak with a human about specific fees.
